name: The World Eater
description:
Controls: 

WASD: Up, Down, Left, Right to move main character around map.

E: Command Black Hole To move to mouse.

Z: Command Black to go to player.

Game Goal:

So, you've unleashed a black hole and need to get it under control. However, this black hole is particularly moody. When purple, it will follow your mouse pointer when you use the E-key spell. When blue, it's confused and erratic, going in all directions. The scariest is its orange form, which shows the black hole is angry at its creator and chases you around the map. Can you control it long enough to devour the whole country?

Lore:

Choose between the mad scientist Jim “Singularity” Darkness or the enthusiast witch Lilly “Startaker” Fusion to try to control the beast. Beware, as it might easily get Out of control and destroy you or itself! As to manipulate the black hole, you will have to give it commands : Should it stay in place, where should it go, should it follow you… With these, ensure it is sufficiently nourished to survive as long as possible. But be careful to avoid the elements attracted by the black hole, as they might hurt you!

__________________________________________________________________

The World Eater is our submission for the 2020’s GMTK Game Jam, themed “Out of Control”.

Team Lead: ApricotWTF

Game Design: ApricotWTF, chic5

Art by: Nanako Shu;

Code by: ApricotWTF, chic5, Frord;

Music by: Massimiliano.vi, Stunbox (?);

Scenario by: Patchoulidere.C;

Special Thanks: Anu, Aeon;
